data.title: Riola → Prato Centrale by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Riola to Prato Centrale in 8h 20m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Riola to Prato Centrale today.
data.text:
Want to travel from Riola to Prato Centrale by train? Start your journey with us.

The train from Riola to Prato Centrale usually takes 11 hours 5 minutes on average to travel 24 miles (39 km), although the quickest services can take as little as 8 hours 20 minutes. You can expect to find 14 trains per day running on this popular route. As there aren’t any direct services running between Riola and Prato Centrale, you’ll need to make 3 changes on your way to Prato Centrale. You can choose to travel with Frecciarossa or Trenitalia to get to Prato Centrale – both train companies offer modern comfortable services that will whisk you there in no time.

To help you get the best train deals, we'll highlight the cheapest train ticket prices from Riola to Prato Centrale in our Journey Planner. Just remember, the sooner you book your tickets, the more you'll save!

Keep reading for more information about the train journey to Prato Centrale, including FAQs, timetables with first and last train times and tips on booking cheap train tickets. If you’re ready to book, just start a search for tickets with us today.
